from django.db import models

class Currency(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    code = models.CharField(max_length=3)
    
class ExchangeRate(models.Model):
    base_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='base_currency', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    target_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='target_currency', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    rate = models.FloatField()
    date = models.DateField()

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('currencies/', views.CurrencyList.as_view()),
    path('exchange-rates/', views.ExchangeRateList.as_view()),
]

from rest_framework import generics
from .models import Currency, ExchangeRate
from .serializers import CurrencySerializer, ExchangeRateSerializer

class CurrencyList(generics.ListCreateAPIView):
    queryset = Currency.objects.all()
    serializer_class = CurrencySerializer


class ExchangeRateList(generics.ListCreateAPIView):
    queryset = ExchangeRate.objects.all()
    serializer_class = ExchangeRateSerializer

20.code:
from django.urls import path
from .views import home_view, blog_post_view, about_view, categories_view, archive_view

urlpatterns = [
	path('', home_view.display_latest_blogs, name='home'),
	path('blog/<int:blog_id>/', blog_post_view.read_blog_content, name='read_blog'),
	path('blog/<int:blog_id>/comments/', blog_post_view.comments_section, name='comments'),
	path('add_post/', blog_post_view.add_post, name='add_post'),
	path('edit_post/<int:post_id>/', blog_post_view.manage_post, name='edit_post'),
	path('delete_post/<int:post_id>/', blog_post_view.manage_post, name='delete_post'),
	path('delete_comment/<int:comment_id>/', blog_post_view.manage_comments, name='delete_comment'),
	path('about/', about_view.display_author_information, name='about'),
	path('contact/', about_view.contact_form, name='contact'),
	path('categories/', categories_view.list_blog_categories, name='categories'),
	path('category/<int:category_id>/', categories_view.filter_by_category, name='filter_category'),
	path('edit_category/<int:category_id>/', categories_view.manage_categories, name='edit_category'),
	path('delete_category/<int:category_id>/', categories_view.manage_categories, name='delete_category'),
	path('archive/', archive_view.display_archived_posts, name='archive'),
	path('archive/<str:month>/', archive_view.date_filter, name='filter_date'),
]

from django.db import models

class BlogPost(models.Model):
	title = models.CharField(max_length=255)
	author = models.CharField(max_length=100)
	content = models.TextField()
	created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
	category = models.ForeignKey(Category, on_delete=models.CASCADE)


class Category(models.Model):
	name = models.CharField(max_length=50)

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import BlogPost, Category

admin.site.register(BlogPost)
admin.site.register(Category)
